name: Last Chance: The Survivor
summary: Last Chance: The Survivor is a VR-based action-shooter game that chronicles the gripping journey of Gabriel, starting as a scientist in an army laboratory and continuing as a father searching for his daughter in a post-apocalyptic world. Following a devastating catastrophe that has ravaged the world, Gabriel focuses on one sole purpose in his ruined life: finding his lost daughter. During this journey, Gabriel faces the challenges of a broken world, enduring both physical and emotional battles.
